channel.title: Skill – GAME ONLINE
channel.description: GAME ACRADE - HTML5 FREE PLAY ONLINE

item.title: Leader War
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Run and collect followers on the map. The only way for survival is to get more and more followers. You can grab your opponents’ follower from their behind before they find what you are doing. Can you be the boss in this war? Join the game and start to run.Use the mouse or your finger […]
item.content:encoded:
Run and collect followers on the map. The only way for survival is to get more and more followers. You can grab your opponents’ follower from their behind before they find what you are doing. Can you be the boss in this war? Join the game and start to run.
Use the mouse or your finger to play.

item.title: Fruit Snake
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Fruit Snake is a classic game of snake in a color version, in which you need to collect fruits, for each eaten fruit added extra time! Tap or arrow keys to move. Enjoy the game!PC: Arrow keys to move. Mobile Phone: Tap buttons on screen to move.
item.content:encoded:
Fruit Snake is a classic game of snake in a color version, in which you need to collect fruits, for each eaten fruit added extra time! Tap or arrow keys to move. Enjoy the game!
PC: Arrow keys to move. Mobile Phone: Tap buttons on screen to move.

item.title: Monkey Banana Jump
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: This is a jumping endless game. The monkey is hungry. You need to control him to jump and collect as many bananas as possible. New fruits will give him magic power, enjoy!Tap or click arrow key to play.
item.content:encoded:
This is a jumping endless game. The monkey is hungry. You need to control him to jump and collect as many bananas as possible. New fruits will give him magic power, enjoy!
Tap or click arrow key to play.

item.title: Fruit Master
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Young ninjas hide in the fast-growing world of modern times and even drink juice is so cool. In Fruit Master, you need to throw a dagger and cut the fruit to squeeze the juice. The operation is extremely simple. Throw a dagger and cut the fruit. The fruit in the air is spinning so you […]
item.content:encoded:
Young ninjas hide in the fast-growing world of modern times and even drink juice is so cool. In Fruit Master, you need to throw a dagger and cut the fruit to squeeze the juice. The operation is extremely simple. Throw a dagger and cut the fruit. The fruit in the air is spinning so you may hit nothing. And the difficulty of the game will gradually increase. Can you become a fruit master? Come and have fun.
Use the mouse or your finger to play.

item.title: Light It Up
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Light It Up is an arcade game with both puzzle elements and special operation skills. As a player who is ready to challenge himself should know how to balance collecting stars and complete the current level. All the harder levels are forcing players to make a choise. The game itself has limited difficulty thanks to […]
item.content:encoded:
Light It Up is an arcade game with both puzzle elements and special operation skills. As a player who is ready to challenge himself should know how to balance collecting stars and complete the current level. All the harder levels are forcing players to make a choise. The game itself has limited difficulty thanks to the path you choose.
Use mouse or tap to play.

item.title: Fire Truck Driving Simulator
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Fire Truck Driving Simulator is a fire truck driving simulation game with 4 different modes.On PCWASD or Arrow keys = driveTap the right button = change to the water gunSwipe the screen with the mouse = switch the cameraOn MobileTap the buttons on the screen
item.content:encoded:
Fire Truck Driving Simulator is a fire truck driving simulation game with 4 different modes.
On PCWASD or Arrow keys = driveTap the right button = change to the water gunSwipe the screen with the mouse = switch the cameraOn MobileTap the buttons on the screen

item.title: Mahjong Sort Puzzle
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mahjong Sort Puzzle is a brain online game. You sort out the mahjong, sort out the mahjong with the same color into a grid and they will all be eliminated.On PCClick or tap to play.On MobileTap to play.
item.content:encoded:
Mahjong Sort Puzzle is a brain online game. You sort out the mahjong, sort out the mahjong with the same color into a grid and they will all be eliminated.
On PCClick or tap to play.On MobileTap to play.

item.title: Shooting World – Gun Fire
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Shooting World – Gun Fire is a skillful 3D FPS game. Use your weapon to aim and shoot various targets to get higher scores. Simple and unique gun control experience, aiming and shooting at the targets can be done easily with one hand.PC & MobileHold to aim, release to fire
item.content:encoded:
Shooting World – Gun Fire is a skillful 3D FPS game. Use your weapon to aim and shoot various targets to get higher scores. Simple and unique gun control experience, aiming and shooting at the targets can be done easily with one hand.
PC & MobileHold to aim, release to fire

item.title: Bike Stunt Racing Legend
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Bike Stunt Racing Legend is a balanced stunt simulation game. You are required to ride the motorbike to the finish line. Don’t be afraid of rolling ramps, pass the green arrows to speed up more easily. Keep calm and step on the gas!On PCW = forwardS = backA = liftD = pressR = flipOn MobileTap […]
item.content:encoded:
Bike Stunt Racing Legend is a balanced stunt simulation game. You are required to ride the motorbike to the finish line. Don’t be afraid of rolling ramps, pass the green arrows to speed up more easily. Keep calm and step on the gas!
On PCW = forwardS = backA = liftD = pressR = flipOn MobileTap the buttons on the screen

item.title: Real Flight Simulator
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Real Flight Simulator is a casual airplane driving game. You can learn how to drive an airplane including starting, steering, and landing. All of the complicated instrument panels are simplified for you to learn.On PCSlide up and down the right button = powerWASD = steer the directionsOn MobileDarg the green button = steerSlide the right […]
item.content:encoded:
Real Flight Simulator is a casual airplane driving game. You can learn how to drive an airplane including starting, steering, and landing. All of the complicated instrument panels are simplified for you to learn.
On PCSlide up and down the right button = powerWASD = steer the directionsOn MobileDarg the green button = steerSlide the right button = power
